wargame.basic_types

Class SerializableBufferedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • java.awt.image.BufferedImage
        • wargame.basic_types.SerializableBufferedImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.awt.image.WritableRenderedImage, java.awt.Transparency, java.io.Serializable

    public class SerializableBufferedImage
extends java.awt.image.BufferedImage
implements java.io.Serializable
    Make the BufferedImage class serializable. Unluckily, it does not make it deserializable. So we cannot load games.
    Author:
    Balthazar Pavot
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
